levels.description:
Continuously barrages a fixed area in front of this unit at max range, <@ba.vup>expanding</> explosion area and increasing ATK to <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale_2:0%}</>. Enemies closer to the impact site in a smaller area will instead take <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as damage. 
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration, can manually deactivate skill</>
